title: SRCOIN Hits Market Cap of $7.03 Million (SRCOIN)
content: SRCOIN (CURRENCY:SRCOIN) traded flat against the US dollar during the 24-hour period ending at 17:00 PM ET on June 2nd. One SRCOIN token can now be bought for about $0.0014 or 0.00000019 BTC on cryptocurrency exchanges. Over the last week, SRCOIN has traded flat against the US dollar. SRCOIN has a total market cap of $7.03 million and $0.00 worth of SRCOIN was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours.    Here’s how similar cryptocurrencies have performed over the last 24 hours:    Ripple (XRP) traded 4.3% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008407 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded 4.2% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003914 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded 0.9% higher against the dollar and now trades at $1.89 or 0.00024749 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded up 5.3% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0610 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded up 3.8% against the dollar and now trades at $56.56 or 0.00740923 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded 1.1% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012957 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded 9.5% higher against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048676 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded up 4.8% against the dollar and now trades at $14.71 or 0.00192636 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded up 10.4% against the dollar and now trades at $7.77 or 0.00101838 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded up 7.7% against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001554 BTC.   About SRCOIN    SRCOIN’s total supply is 15,000,000,000 tokens and its circulating supply is 5,052,048,084 tokens. SRCOIN’s official website is www.srcoin.info . SRCOIN’s official Twitter account is @SRCoin_ICO . The official message board for SRCOIN is medium.com/@SRCOIN .  SRCOIN Token Trading    SRCOIN can be traded on the following cryptocurrency exchanges: CoinBene. It is usually not presently possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as SRCOIN directly using US dollars. Investors seeking to trade SRCOIN should first buy Bitcoin or Ethereum using an exchange that deals in US dollars such as GDAX, Coinbase or Gemini. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Bitcoin or Ethereum to buy SRCOIN using one of the exchanges listed above.
